text: Maurílio Jorge Quintal de Gouveia (5 August 1932 - 19 March 2019) was a Portuguese Roman Catholic archbishop. == Biography == Quintal de Gouveia was born in Portugal and was ordained to the priesthood in 1955. He served as titular bishop of Sabiona and was auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Lisbon, Portugal, from 1973 to 1981. He then served as archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Évora, Portugal from 1981 to 2008.Maurilio Jorge Quintal de Gouveia ==Notes== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Portuguese Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Maurílio de Gouveia
